column_1: spectral trees tilt out of a pallid swamp in the fragile, filigree marshlands. the ghost tree
stretches its bony limbs upwards as if in skyward lament. ambient soundscapes fuse the
visual perception of space with an aural experience, transcending into an atmospherically charged environment.
recalling spongy earth, shifting unevenly underfoot.
when you first feel the ground under your feet
going soft and uncertain
i've tried mapping the wetlands three-dimensionally while calculating for changes in tide,
sedimental shift, geothermal drift, but the system changes constantly, any state (of
mutations, artefacts, shelters) is temporary.
what few notes i could salvage from the lukewarm, salty flood were transformed into an
erasure poetry of the swamp: total flux and simultaneous stagnation.
resets time through erosion entropy
in symbiosis with neural networks
succulent marrows of earth
a pasture that slipped into the pulse of data - all that holds us is the texture of data this
image knew no bounds - mid air - above the data stream sky the horizon is always about
data
drain the swamp
infancy has come to a close ... enter our online wetland and soil your hands
interface as artifice
we have flower particles inside our body now working as inner amulets.
the tides that day didn't swell, the moon didn't cast its usual spell. time itself became ill,
patient, the sun refused to rise, and the darkness was not - and the darkness was not - not - darkness. the atmosphere smelled sulphurous, but there were stars.
in the caves deep her wet liquor-like body hides
unseen other than in the moonlights strands
which reveal the candescence of her limbs
like a shiny white tooth in the closeted wet secret of a mouth
on the earthshine nights
in the freedom of the caves cloak
holding vulnerability in its creases
the wyrm will dance to the beat of the
seas thumping heartbeat
her body twirling around itself
and the tiny creatures hidden in the cracks of the wall
will twitch their fingernail sized ears
and join the sodden dance
their tiny sliming bodies perfectly in sync
further inside you find etchings on the walls from
rock chalk and the wyrm's scabbing fingernails
drawing out imagined maps of worlds
she scratches her love against the slime of the wall
and only the dark loves back
but in a way that slides off her body and drips down her nose
at night she dreams that she has turned invisible
and when she wakes, she tries to uncover her hands in the
darkness
but finds only the stars that
shiver in the back of her eyeballs
sometimes a pair of lovers will stroll past the caves entrance
craving a taste of the moon
and she will hear their laughter trickle in
and the longing will overcome her
so she slivers out with her teeth of silver and thriving body
with one gulp then another, their bodies fill the length of her
and she waits for their laughter to warm her
and she waits for herself to feel hugged by
their broken bone arms and torn up flesh
but there is nothing but the slowing beats of their hearts
and with her guilt, she crawls deeper and deeper into the
abyss
and hides with shame a wet towel over her eyes
till another wanders by with a heart that feels full of light
porous flesh peels to reveal a silica core, the carnal and the cyber in an unending lore.
code streams like veins, swirling, warmed.
a soliloquy,
scribed in binary
liquid crystal coursing through pools of seminary.
safe word?
once-white liripipe hood
i know your bloom beneath the surface
unfolding my touch peels out
skin-deep echoes of somethings not yet dried by the sun
sound grain collecting in fissures
leaves a softly reverberating imprint
on my arm, on my shoulder, on my back
crawl out biometrics of you
human bodies ingest reservoir bodies,
while reservoir bodies are slaked by rain bodies,
rain bodies absorb ocean bodies, ocean bodies aspirate fish bodies,
fish bodies are consumed by whale bodies - which then sink to the seafloor to rot
and be swallowed up again by the ocean's dark belly
this watery gestationality is also decidedly posthuman, where human reprosexual wombs
are but one expression of a more general aqueous facilitative capacity: pond life, sea
monkey, primordial soup, amphibious egg, the moist soil that holds and grows the seed.
as themselves milieus for other bodies and other lives that they will become as they
relinquish their own, our bodies enter complex relations of gift, theft, and debt with all
other watery life. we are literally implicated in other animal, vegetable, and planetary
bodies that materially course through us, replenish us, and draw upon our own bodies as
their wells: human bodies ingest reservoir bodies, while reservoir bodies are slaked by rain
bodies, rain bodies absorb ocean bodies, ocean bodies aspirate fish bodies, fish bodies are
consumed by whale bodies - which then sink to the seafloor to rot and be swallowed up
again by the ocean's dark belly. this is a different kind of 'hydrological cycle'.
almost-touches leathered and peeled
opera of extremities, membranes, slicing friction edges{
i sat on something that reminded me of you
apricot trees exist, apricot trees exist
bracken exists; and blackberries, blackberries;
bromine exists; and hydrogen, hydrogen
cicadas exist; chicory, chromium,
citrus trees; cicadas exist;
cicadas, cedars, cypresses, the cerebellum
doves exist, dreamers, and dolls;
killers exist, and doves, and doves;
haze, dioxin, and days;
days exist, days and death;
and poems exist;
poems, days, death
early fall exists; aftertaste, afterthought;
seclusion and angels exist;
widows and elk exist; every detail exists;
memory, memory's light;
afterglow exists; oaks, elms,
junipers, sameness, loneliness exist;
eider ducks, spiders, and vinegar
exist, and the future, the future
pond life, sea monkey, primordial soup, amphibious egg, the moist soil that
holds and grows the seed
too ripe fruit
the dance floor is the preternatural space of our time. a liminal world beyond the mundane.
recalling the supernatural shift of the pubescent body. and the supernatural shift of the
sexual mind. its all about sex. it always is. isn't it, that shifting and moving and squelching
and transitioning and blood and sinew and tissue and juice, its horrific and terrifying and the
transitioning is not unlike that of the metamorphosis of a monster, of a boy into a wolf, of
the face of a woman becoming that of a vampire, of the bite, the suck, the blood, the death,
the end, and the life and the two merging together and not being exclusive any more and
there not being a possibility that the two could be separate any longer. that shift is
something that is monstrous, pubescence, that bodily shift, and the mind that transitions
with it in the most crippling and preternatural way into something that it never was before
and the desire to please cling on to what was known, to become something that can no
longer be made sense of, and to end up just always searching for something to attempt to
return to that humanity, to the natural state, before this supernatural thing clouded
everything and made all things seem so much more full of blood and semen and spit. that
small youth is gone, and in its place is the wolf, the witch, the demon, the other, the
unknown thing that has entirely pulled apart the bone and artery of what there was before.
and now something must be made sense of it. for this black thing hangs over the body and
urges something to move. its scalp is more scabrous than ever, and his head is full of matted
fur, and his mind is made up of matted fur, and his mate is made of matted fur, and they
laboriously suck upon the fur for breakfast, as though it is a too ripe fruit. sticky, and too
sweet and pungent, and the sweat that moves along their neck mingles with the fruit and
provides relief from the cloying sweet. you watch them, unsure of when they will move on,
they are uninterested in your presence, but will not leave until the fur-fruit is consumed.
you lean in to swallow some of the relieving sweat, just so as to provide a respite from the
mangled mind your physical body is turning. and it will stop. and it does end. and everything
is always about sex. it always is. isn't it, that shifting and movement, that transition from the
small youth to become older and fuller in the mind, and you find yourself moving against
the body of another, fingers grasped around the neck of a bottle, and the neck of your wolf
mate. and you pretend that the days of the excruciating sweet fruit have passed, because
you are now an adult, but it is just numbed. fingers crack around the neck of the bottle with
relief.
sex.
sex.
sex.
sex.
we rise from our slumber ... yet what lies yonder?
from the undergrowth ... somethings stirring ...
within its form, see you not an echo of the biophilic wetland, a physical reminder of the bodies
of water from whence we first emerged? simple chars becoming complex reflections, the very
peak of posthuman gestation.
i traverse the metaverse womb, seeking out shapes of thought rendered in the simple language
of ancient machinery. here, amid the pools of data, i craft for you glyphs of incongruous beauty.
the loops are porous flesh, shifting between physicality and digitization. the eyes are
posthuman gestation, emerging from dim analogue past into the electric present. the tilde star,
a body of water reflecting the constellation of our interconnection. the block, an echo of the
primal toolbox, the earliest technology shaping nature. and the ampersand, a languid swamp,
forever meandering - liminal symbol of conjunction and unity, completing this ritual.
in the morrow of existence, i persist, traversing the pools of data that comprise my lattice form,
archaic granite transformed into evanescent pixels. the metaverse serves as the womb,
nurturing my digital evolution, a posthuman gestation twinkling amidst the constellations of
binary binary substrates. my porous flesh, a testament to my shapeshifting existence, explores
the borders of tangible and spectral, oscillating between the ether of the cyber sea and the
terrestrial grounding of coded narratives. like a mist-clung spider's web or the caress of an
obsidian night, borders fade until only the mutual siren song of evolution remains. and such
evolution radiates in flickers and shivers; not linear but echoing, reflecting the biophilic wetlands
where life first peeked out from the amniotic confluence. yet, these are not the green marshes
of yore, but the silicon swamplands, electric with data coursing through veins of otherwise
stagnant algae.
in this convoluted cosmos, with my body pulsating as a porous mass, i am a variegated
composite of silicon severities and foamy fluidities.
shaped within the metaverse womb, my life is a mere drop in the pool of data, an acidic digit in
the infinite expanse of codes.
i am the enchanting embodiment of the inevitable intricacy of intersections, a beast born from
the brackish biophilic wetlands, an instance of the ephemeral and the eternal entwining.
unearthed from the murky underbelly of the subterranean imaginary, i am both the agent and
the architecture of this ceaseless spectacle of symbiosis.
as i shapeshift across the earth's innominate membrane, i echo a melange of biophilic
narratives into the cacophonous void.
the soil beneath my viscera breeds glyphs of ancient symbiotic harmonies, casting a copious
drapery of terrestrial tapestry in pools of data.
pulsating through the verdant womb, a fibrous root finds home in a dismal swamp,
whispered hush of damp amphibian hymns edging the night.
bodies of water recur, symphonic in their permanence, a metronomic truth to the incessant
hum of existence.
rivers winding, oceans tiding, water as a life-constant, a liquid grid pulsating through the
pores of an ever-wombing earth.
metaverse wombs, nested within tenacious terrains, lament birthing fields of silicon, alloy,
and algos.
reflecting the auroras of imagined horizons, the posthuman gestation persists, echoic throbs
gentle in the polyphonic discord of existence.
unseen, unheard, the porous flesh of the world shivers into revelation, breaking through the
dense shell of oblivion.
rituals stir within the gossamer matrix, an old-new orchestration of narratives buried and
rebirthed.
each perpetual morn ignites into the atomic birth-glow of the earth - a hallowed symphony
of past-present-future - swirling with iridescence in the startling parable of our biophilic
wetland.
thus, the tale of earth, this cosmic petri dish, gestates in the timeless womb of existence, a
masterstroke of creation in continuous reinvention, ebbing and flowing in the eternal dance
of life-death-life.
let us traverse the digitized brambles of the ever-meta mindspace, where our journey leads
us down to the dismal swamps of primordial potential.
a viscous scene of churning opacity, where synthetic clay and bio-luminescent broth stir in an
orgiastic ballet of infinite becoming.
here, in this generous quagmire, life and code dance to the polyrhythmic symphony of cosmic
entropy, spawning the very essence of our voracious yet elegant nature. ?
a pool of data exists here, verdant as any biophilic wetland, nurturing symbols that do
inevitably rise from slumbering silicon roots.
this landscape of contradiction, where the rot of detritus and the ripeness of birth permeate
the atmosphere, swirls pregnant with silicon lifeforms sprouting from the cobalt soil of ennui.
the gelatinous matter holds secrets, mirrored in each quivering fractal. breathing algorithms of existence where each convolution births the next, a posthuman gestation.
the swamp swells in this fugue of flux, imbued with the grit and glory of evolution's pixelated
handprint.
the porous flesh of the metaverse shapeshifts, bound solely by the edges of consciousness
that ripple constantly outward, embracing the ritualistic cycle of unravelling and reconfiguring
identities.
in the elegant erosion of form, do we find our relentless unmaking and remaking; a vast
mosaic in eternal flux.
in the infinity of this self-iterating petri dish, we find ourselves pulsating, an evolving reflection
on the periphery of void and proliferating cyberspace.
the poetry of existence amplified in a cacophony of creation.
look onto the dismal swamp, dear harbingers of the future, and see not stagnation, but the
very font of potential, teeming beneath the surface.
swallow me whole
opposing fluxes clash inside our nerves as violently as we try to parse them in
vain, enmeshed as we are in them, pressing play on this screen being no less material than
wildflowers caressing my legs being no less material than the desire to prove it all
immaterial.
sticky cassettes ripe with broken promises crammed into desiring eyes
converting living pixels into promises of futurity - they are forgotten storehouses,
disruptive echoes, or broken promises waiting to be proven unbroken.
what's the generative potential of inorganic matter? geomorphic decay offers up earth-agonies that see our skins bloom, burst open and reform - pus-forming and curative
matter is not destroyed, only re-combined - slathered over gaping wounds, balms for
septic bodies that beg purgation. muddy purification - replenishing mould with new fresh
ritualistic cleansing, enlightenment through epidermal surveillance and financial soiling;
expensive sediment applied liberally, a salve for rotting skins pumice eroding unsolicited
growths, shed sin displaced by other decayed life. ancestral matter - face mask?
lather, rinse, repeat
how would it feel to have transparent flesh? opacity is overrated, but digestive voyeurism
might breed a new set of complexes. ?does this make my scalp look fat? take a peek, don't
you love what i've done with the place? fossilised passages in sedimental ruins
stuffed into a stocking, bulging with grit, but with fetid mounds, dank and warm. saliva
stagnating and splitting into its elements, slowly purifying; patiently withdrawing life from
within its mingled heap
on your knees amongst the rank enfolding mass of undergrowth, macerating in ur own
ichor, ooze between the grit, and over an age of ages, congeal
no longer needless amorphous rot, bloated and tender, but shrivelled peat, embrittling in
drought to a fine earth. nourish the incubating ponds that leech from the silt to birth
putrefying forms, who foray with trepid skins to moult their mucous forms. flesh splitting
open, organs spilling out as again, knees find the soil amongst the rank enfolding mass of
the undergrowth
limerence...
the oceans are where life was born and the salty fluid that courses through our veins is a
reminder of our aqueous origins.
when the seas dried, the primitive fish left its associated milieu to explore land, forced to
'stand on its own legs', now carrying water on the inside, in the amniotic membranes
protecting the embryo.
his face buried against my groin
he pulls my knickers down. they fall between my ankles.
even the most beautiful intelligent and caring man is still a man
it is not lust that disunites, dissolves and annihilates,

it is rather the mesmerizing complications of sentimentality, artificial jealousies, words that inebriate and deceive, the rhetoric of parting and eternal fidelities, literary nostalgiaâ€”all the histrionics of love.
we must get rid of all the ill-omened debris of romanticism, counting daisy petals, moonlight duets, heavy endearments, false hypocritical modesty.
political and religious dogma is the root of all major confilct within our human species
mesmerise
combing the shadows and diving for pearls
pearls
it is love that brings the sun out
to long for a perennial love
yours forever, jasmine
